name: Ghost Knight Templar
description: The Ghost Knight Templar is a ghostly warrior in plate armor, exuding an aura of dread. Its spectral form moves fluidly through the battlefield, wielding a Shadow Blade.
memorable: Its ability to move through objects and deal cold damage while passing through enemies creates a chilling presence on the battlefield.
goals: Typically seeks to serve its own dark purposes, which may involve acting as a guardian for ancient sites or serving a dark master.
relations: Often associated with other undead creatures, particularly ghouls, and may command them.
environment: Commonly found in haunted locations, graveyards, or battlefields from long ago.
strengths: Possesses many immunities and resistances, making it tough to defeat in combat. Its ability to deal high damage from cold while evading attacks adds to its deadly nature.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to turning effects if isolated from allies who benefit from its Turning Defiance ability.
attacks: Uses its Shadow Blade for melee attacks with slashing and necrotic damage, along with multiattack capabilities for multiple strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Stride of Damnation allows it to move through enemies while dealing significant cold damage, creating a potential area of effect attack as it moves.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 17, making it adept at spotting hidden threats.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enabling it to notice others' stealthy movements.
additional_information: Incorporeal Movement enables it to traverse objects and creatures seamlessly.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep, allowing endless endurance.
Charge attack provides extra damage if it moves quickly before striking.
Can summon a ghostly mount with incorporeal traits for added mobility.
Resistant to necrotic damage and non-magical attacks enhances its combat longevity.

lawful evil ghost knight that moves through objects
powerful ghostly warrior with cold attacks
